title: Chickadee42's Dossier/File Author Page Directory Thingy
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:space]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


I am a writer person who does writing stuff. I could be described as a Canadian writer trying to write stories about Cold War era Russian life despite never having been anywhere near Eastern Europe. And other stuff. 

Also I like birds. Birds are awesome. And I love chickadees. Chickadees are the cutest little birds.

[[image 20230324_143744566_iOS%201.jpg]]

Oh yeah, I also do nature photography. I have a lot of great photos of chickadees like that. And frogs. And some insects. 

[[include component:author-page
  order=created_at |
  perpage=100 |
  background=yes |
  image=yes |
  sortbar=yes |
]]

I also found out someone [https://www.fanfiction.net/s/14170265/5/Anomalies-Beyond-the-Falls wrote a fanfic involving SCP-7044 with Gravity Falls Characters]. I don't know anything about Gravity Falls but they certainly found a few interesting ways to use my creation.
author: Chickadee42
